title: Flowmaster Force II Cat-back Exhaust System for the 1998-2003 Ford F-150 (PN 17472 and 817472)
description: Designed for the person who wants the look of a traditional dual exhaust system with all the benefits that a Flowmaster Cat-back exhaust system provides, this D.O.R./D.O.S. system is the perfect choice. This system includes exit pipes for both dual out rear and dual out side configurations so that you can choose the one that fits your style. This Force II system delivers a moderate exterior tone and mild interior tone, and is suited to customers looking for efficiency improvements without a lot of noise. Especially recommended for towing applications. Constructed in durable 409S stainless steel, the system is covered by a 10-year warranty. Like all Flowmaster systems, the benefits include improved throttle response, power and mileage. Designed for an easy fit, the system includes all the necessary parts and hardware for an easy installation.
